original_text: While Jesus was eating a meal there, a woman came into the house. She brought a small stone jar with her. The jar contained expensive oil with a very nice smell. She poured the oil over Jesus' head while he sat there.
korean_text: 한 여자가 매우 귀한 향유 한 옥합을 가지고 나아와서 식사하시는 예수의 머리에 부으니

sentences.original_text: While Jesus was eating a meal there
a woman came into the house
She brought a small stone jar with her

sentences.korean_translation: 그 병에는 비싼 기름이 담겨 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: She poured the oil over Jesus' head
